** {{nbt|list}}{{nbt|string|items}}: (Optional) {{json ref/item|tag=1}}. Tests if the type of item in the item stack matches any of the listed values.
** {{nbt|int|count}}: (Optional) Tests the number of items in this item stack. Use an integer to test for a single value.
** {{nbt|compound|count}}: (Optional) Another format.
*** {{nbt|int|max}}: (Optional) The maximum value.
*** {{nbt|int|min}}: (Optional) The minimum value.
** {{nbt|compound|components}}: (Optional) Matches exact item component values. Each key in this object corresponds to a component to test, with its value as the desired data to compare.
*** See [[data component format]].
** {{nbt|compound|predicates}}: (Optional) Matches [[data component predicate]]s.
*** See [[data component predicate]].
